description: The file contains CMake functions, macros, and scripts related to building, linking, and packaging CMake projects. It defines various helper functions for managing dependencies, link libraries, include directories, and configuration files, facilitating the creation and installation of CMake package files and modules.

methods.name: add_element
methods.description: Appends an element to a list variable in CMake.

methods.name: get_if_link_libraries
methods.description: Retrieves linked libraries and their directories for a given target, handling imported and regular targets, and resolving interface dependencies.

methods.name: get_if_compile_defines
methods.description: Collects all compile definitions associated with a target, including interface and dependency definitions.

methods.name: get_if_compile_options
methods.description: Collects all compile options associated with a target, including interface and dependency options.

methods.name: get_if_include_dirs
methods.description: Gathers include directories for a target, resolving interface directories and handling relative and absolute paths.

methods.name: InstallCMakeConfig
methods.description: Generates and installs CMake package configuration files (.cmake) for targets, supporting versioning and dependencies.

methods.name: InstallPackageConfig
methods.description: Creates and installs .pc (pkg-config) files based on target properties, including compile options, defines, and include dirs.

methods.name: InstallFindModule
methods.description: Installs CMake find modules (.cmake) from a specified directory or list of files, optionally recursing into subdirectories.

methods.name: print_properties
methods.description: Prints the list of CMake properties supported in the current version.

methods.name: print_target_properties
methods.description: Outputs all available properties and their values for a specified target.

methods.name: semicolon_safe_string
methods.description: Replaces semicolons in a string with a non-printable ASCII character to make it safe for CMake variables.

methods.name: InstallCompatibleCMakeConfig
methods.description: Creates a compatible interface for legacy targets in CMake, linking to an existing target and optionally copying headers.
